html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-11722024-11-05ISED
ActTelecommunications Act
SubjectOrder Referring Telecom Decision CRTC 2023-358 Back to the CRTC
PrecisOrder Referring Telecom Decision CRTC 2023-358 Back to the the Canadian Radio-television and telecommunications Commission in order to reconsider, no later than 90 days after the day on which this Order is made, whether Bell Canada, Rogers Communications Canada Inc. and TELUS Communications Inc. and their afﬁliates should be prohibited from using aggregated fibre-to-the-premises services in Ontario and Quebec further to tariffs approved by the Commission.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order Referring Telecom Decision CRTC 2023-358 Back to the the Canadian Radio-television and telecommunications Commission in order to reconsider, no later than 90 days after the day on which this Order is  made, whether Bell Canada, Rogers Communications Canada Inc.  and TELUS Communications Inc.  and their afﬁliates should be prohibited from using aggregated fibre-to-the-premises services in Ontario and Quebec further to tariffs approved by the Commission.
